title: I didn't get the 400 RP when I finish the tutorials
body:
Well, the thing is, I was calculate the RP for buying skin, and I need like 50 more, and I asked my friend for help :P
my friend told me, "There's 400 RP when you finish the tutorials, didn't you get it?"
and I was confusing for it, and I asked my other friend, they all get it, buttttt I didn't ;(((
Is this kind of error? cuz I need this 400 as soon as I can ;(((

replies.body: As our friends here have mentioned, new accounts now receive a [new player chest](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ZGErnvY4-hextech-crafting-new-player-chests-to-replace-400-rp) instead of RP.  If you need a small amount of RP, we may be able to help!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll see what we can do.  Let me know if you have any questions!

I need like 65 RP :P
for my Challenger Ahri {{champion:103}} 
I have 423 RP now, I think I will return the Janna's skin (487)
and I can buy Ahri :D

So, how to earn these 65 RP, what should I do?
They removed the fee RP and now new accounts get a special hextech chest after reaching level 5.

#Greetings!

I'm pretty sure you're not supposed to receive 400 RP by finishing the tutorial. New accounts get a special hextech chest that guarantees you a skin.
